byline.contributor: Daniel E. Slotnik and Rebecca White contributed reporting from New York, Cindy Wolff from Memphis.
byline.original: By DAVE PHILIPPS and EMMA G. FITZSIMMONS

abstract: Profile of Brandon Bostian, man who has been identified as engineer in fatal Amtrak derailment; friends and family recall that Bostian has been captivated by trains from an early age.
lead_paragraph: Friends of Mr. Bostian, the engineer in the fatal derailment in Philadelphia, recalled his fascination with trains. His lawyer said he did not remember the accident.

headline.main: For Amtrak Engineer Brandon Bostian, Childhood Passion Became a Career
headline.print_headline: For Engineer in Fatal Crash, Lifelong Interest in Rails Helped Shape Career Choice

snippet: Friends of Mr. Bostian, the engineer in the fatal derailment in Philadelphia, recalled his fascination with trains. His lawyer said he did not remember the accident.
